security_note: All sensitive credentials are now managed securely:

backend_secrets.note: Backend secrets are stored in AWS Secrets Manager

frontend_environment.note: Frontend environment variables are managed via AWS Amplify or .env files
frontend_environment.amplify_automatic: VITE_WEBSOCKET_URL is automatically injected by CDK during Amplify deployment
frontend_environment.local_development: Create .env file in frontend/ directory with VITE_WEBSOCKET_URL from CDK output

deployment.note: See SECURITY_DEPLOYMENT.md for complete deployment instructions
deployment.backend: Deploy with CDK: cd infra && cdk deploy
deployment.frontend: Automatic deployment via AWS Amplify on git push to main branch
deployment.manual_frontend: Alternative: cd frontend && npm run build && deploy to S3/CloudFront
